name: Royal Hentai - Boobs & Pussies
description:
Royal Hentai is a puzzle game where the goal is to collect all the images of hot attractive girls by moving the puzzle pieces.
The difficulty level is set in such a way that you enjoy the gameplay and can relax.
Each level has 3 or 4 stages, after assembling each of them you can open these images in the gallery. Also, girls make short sounds when you press on some of their body parts.

Game Features

  • Nice interface
  • Relaxing music
  • No censorship
  • Achievements
  • Gallery
  • Easy mouse control
